comment: BORING!!! There's really no point in being in the class except to catch the pop quizzes. Besides that...everything is in order from the book! If you read, read, read...you'll pass. Again, she's SUPER boring!

First, this is a core class. attendance required. moving on. This professor is very knowledgeable in her field. This means she will want to enlighten you during lectures to give you the big picture perspective.If you talk to her as a person instead of an enemy, you will find she is both brilliant and friendly. Recommended, but not a pushover.

Worst class ever.Style of teaching: old and outdated.Every class was same routine;come in, start talking in her monotone voice until the end of class.Tests horrendous:consisted of 100 questions with 5 multiple choices which were all about a sentence long.A gpa lower no matter how hard you worked.I will make sure no one I know ever takes this class.

although she is knowledegeable but too picky and strict and very hard to please. she might smile at you or laugh with you but grading and testing is too hard for any one because she is thinks tht we know everything on our own.she killed my GPA too plz if u want to maintain ur grades plz do not take her as ur history professor.
worst teacher I ever had. i love history and i had to save myself by not going to class and taught myself everything. just read the chapters in the book. i have no idea why she is still teaching.

The absolute worst teacher I have ever had!!!! She is not a teacher she is a talker about all things nonsense! I hated her class and somehow got out with a C! You can never tell with her tests because she told us a 50 question matching and walked in with an 81 multiple choice. If you value GPA do not take her.

Where to be begin...her lectures are nonsense. She will start on topic then drift off into space and never come back. Her tests are atrociously difficult with poorly worded questions. Assigns busy work. WHO DOES THAT ANYMORE? Avoid this woman AT ALL COSTS.

Horrible. Hate history & this confirmed my belief. Her lectures were alll over the place & exams never really went over what she lectured on. Two papers & those weren't bad but tests were long with lots of multiple choice, short answer & essay on every one. People just stopped showing up after while. Shouldn't teach lower level classes.
This professor really gets off track.  It is very hard to keep up with what she is discussing.

Teaches a lower level course like a grad course.  Study guides are too extensive to feel good about the exams.  Grades extremely hard.  Attendence is not mandatory, but if you do not attend the lecture you will not do well. I got an A but had to work really hard.  If you want an easy prof for a lower level class, do not take her.

Please listen to all of the previous comments: DO NOT TAKE THIS PROFESSOR! She is unclear, and I have spent days studying for her tests without positive results. I ended up switching my major because she made me hate it so much. Don't take her!
great class because you do not have to be there. Hands out the notes at beggining of each class. Test are straight off the notes. I went to one lecture class and still got a B.

This was the hardest class to pass. I am an A student who never misses class and takes diligent notes, which turned out to be irrelevant in the tests. Her study guides were extremely extensive and the topics were not on the tests. I love History but I hated this class. I spent days studying for tests and barely passes. Thank goodness for the curve

OMG you can't understand her. She trails from one topic to another and you have no idea how she got there. you really can't make out what she thinks is important. on all the tests she asks random, obscure questions that were never covered in class or in the book.

She gets off the subject often, grades the essays more for grammar than content (she has an M.A. in English too), and has somewhat of an ego. This class seriously needs more planning on presentation of the lectures.

She gets off the subject often, grades the essays more for grammar than content (she has an M.A. in English too), and has somewhat of an ego. This class serious needs more planning on presentation of the lectures.

She gets off the subject often, grades the essays more for grammar than content (she has an M.A. in English too), and has somewhat of an ego. This class serious needs more planning on presentation of the lectures.
I didn't find her incomprehensible at all. I did fairly well just by coming to class, paying attention to lectures, and reading the assigned material. Pretty common sense stuff.

By far the WORST instructor I've ever had.  Her lectures are full of worthless unintelligible ramblings about stuff that shes NOT going to put on the tests.   she murdered my GPA, avoid her at all costs.

I'm not even going to waste text space stating how bad she is. Trust the other reviews. I will tho agree with the person that said its worth the extra semester just to avoid this class. She KILLED my GPA.

Please listen to these warnings NOT to take this teacher. She's not helpful and gives out study guides that are incorrect whether it's misspelled names or even terms that aren't even going to be on the upcoming test. The only way to survive is by memorizing every last detail about an event and even then she'll ask about something else on the test.

I love history, and she has made it not fun at all. Classes=boring. Like alot of these comments, she is very unhelpful, gets off topic every other minute.  She gives you a studyguide to review for tests, but her questions hardly make sense.  I am a straight A student and struggling to keep a C. She knows what she's talking about, just can't teach i

Her classes are so boring that nearly half of the students drop.  The students who stick around sign the roll then leave, play on their computers, listen to ipods, take naps, work on other subjects, or stare at the wall.  If you like solitaire then take her class.

This teacher is obviously very intelligent; unfortunately it does not translate in her lectures.  On the first test about half the class failed. She was very unhelpful when I asked her questions after class.  Avoid if all possible and take someone who makes history fun.
Earned An A but had to study!! Good Teacher!! I had her on Fridays for 3hrs!! Tells it like it is! : )

WHAT A WASTE OF MY TIME AND MONEY I should have taken someone else. She talks about history as if she was there when they signed the Declaration of Indep. in 1776. No study guides! No help preparing for the test. Quizes make no since. She is difficult and boring. Like I said she teaches as if she lived back then or something

Her class was incredibly hard. I had to drop her class before I failed it, and I am a pretty good student. She does not talk about what needs to be on the quizzes and tests. She just expects you know eerything and basically teach yourself. I would not recommend taking her class at all.

Dr. Papageorge is knowledgable, but she gets off topic alot.  If you have a C by the end of the course, you don't have to take a final. However, you do have to read a chapter of the book for almost every class.
I leaned a lot and she was a great teacher

I've had Dr. Papageorge twice. I truly enjoy her classes- she is amazingly knowledgeable about her material. She provides study guides...how much more helpful can you be!  A bit unorganized but if you go to class you'll be fine.
I felt like an undergrad taking a PhD class with all the work she expects.

Dr. Papageorge is very content knowledgeable; however, she is the the most difficult, unhelpful, and unfriendly professor I have encountered.  Do not take her -- it is worth an extra semester at KSU just get around her classes.
No Comments
